post.body: If I associate anything foodie with a walk, I would walk any distances! Good for health.
if I catch you, will twitpic along with your twitter handle!
okie dokie
yep! Tomorrow for lunch?
HNY to you too! I meant happy current moment(time), can wish that any day, any time ;)
oh yeah Happy 18:05 to you!
are you twitting after ages? I don't even remember when I started following you.
Yay! Can't wait to join the Yatri gang now :)
Happy New Year to you too :)
yep, same as every other day. Rather not be late to start off the year :) Happy New Year to you
maybe there will be more peace in our lives :)
well yeah, have a wonderful NY eve then :)
Aah, that one was created by Rajesh Lalwani. I just invited a few tweeple to join in. Happy New Year to you :)
Is Karbala supposed to be a place?
http://twitpic.com/yno8 - Looks like he had a good NY party last night :)
is out of office - good day again today!
is @ work
visibly less people working today. Can feel that on the roads.
is off to work
Good start for today - http://twitpic.com/yfbr
